hero.title: Learn by doing our live Bootcamps
hero.description: The Blockchain developer’s responsibility is to develop innovative solutions to challenging problems, including solutions for command and control, and high integrity.

bootcamps.name:
Web3Ladies X
Shecodes Africa
bootcamps.description: Web3Ladies partners with Shecodes Africa for our next next bootcamp. We aim to train 50 ladies the basics of Web development in 6 weeks.

hero.title: Web3Ladies X Shecodes Africa
hero.description: The Blockchain developer’s responsibility is to develop innovative solutions to challenging problems, including solutions for command and control, and high integrity.

about.aboutDescription: The partnership is a beginner-friendly training and up-skilling program for Blockchain enthusiasts to gain foundational knowledge in blockchain technology.

goals.goalDescription: The goal is to graduate 10 Ladies, however, we are looking at admitting up to 50 ladies for the bootcamp

sponsors.sponsorsDescription: This is an intensive learning phase of the basics/foundations for all tracks, it serves as the introduction to the track for participants. This phase is for 4weeks, classes will be twice a week (Tuesdays & Thursdays 5 - 7 PM). Across all tracks participants will learn intensively as a beginner, mentors will be on the ground to teach, resources will be shared with the participants, assignments will be given as well, and there will be an eviction at the end of this phase upon final assessment to graduate into the learning phase.

curriculumItems.label: Module O: Prep phase
curriculumItems.content: These mentors will be on the ground for all the mentorship activities, they are responsible for classes, responding to mentees’ concerns on slack, and grading mentees, they will also be compensated monthly.

howItWorks.title: How it works
howItWorks.description: The program is focused on introductory to Blockchain Technology and Smart Contracts for a duration of 4 weeks. Week 1 - 3 will be for intense training and week 4 for the general assessment (project). Attendance will be mandatory for participants and assignments will be given weekly.

scheduleDetails.title: One fireside chat (Building a career in Web3):

benefits.title: Is this bootcamp right for you?
benefits.benefitsListHeader: You will benefit from this programme if you are:

benefitsList.content: A professional looking for deeper knowledge about the impact and applications of blockchain technologies in a business environment
